name: Obstacle Run (BoboBaggins253)
description:
Obstacle Run is a 2D Platformer consisting of nine levels. Each level gets more difficult as the game progresses. This might be a short experience for some, but most will not be able to finish it.

Obstacle Run has full controller support and full mouse and keyboard support. Key/controller mappings can be found bellow.

Jump: (M&K) Space, up arrow, or right mouse button. (Controller) "A" button.

Pause: (M&K) ESC or P. (Controller) Pause button.

Quick Reset: (M&K) R. (Controller) View Button.
